title: Dig a million, make a million
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission and Tom Haydon
brief_description: Reconstructs the financing and business organisation behind the development of the Mount Tom Price iron mine and the associated industry. Shows the role of overseas capital and enterprise in the exploitation of the resources.
